DOC.brief_summary: The Randomized Control Trail included 4,172 low-birth weight children between February 2008 and September 2013 in Bissau. The children who were included in the RCT and who are living in the Bandim Health Project study area will be visited. The study assistants will ask about the health of the child and of both parents. Furthermore, Bacille Calmette-Guerin (BCG) scar status of both child and parents will be checked.
DOC.criteria: Participation during the low birth weight BCG trial between 2008 and 2013. Not living in the Bandim Health Project's study area.
